Detailed Description

Holds information about a compact search.

Fill in this structure and send it to SearchParserHandler.

If area id is valid then the m_where field must be ignored. If location is valid then the m_topRegion field must be ignored, and the top region will come from the position.

Non-empty m_categoryName means category search with m_categoryName as the name of the category ( Restaurant, Airport etc ) and m_what as the name of a specific item in the category ( mcdonalds, starbucks etc ) and m_where contains the location ( city, municipal etc ).

If m_heading is not equal to -1 then the m_round will be ignored and calculated from m_heading.
